thread.title_full: Justin Bieber's outburst at fans as he 'struggles with fatherhood' - Celebrity News - Entertainment - Daily Express US

author: Jailene Cuevas, Shanicka Anderson
title: Justin Bieber's outburst at fans as he 'struggles with fatherhood' - Celebrity News - Entertainment - Daily Express US
text: Justin Bieber's 'concerning' outburst at fans as he 'struggles with fatherhood' Justin Bieber has been in the spotlight for over a decade, and a new report claims he's been struggling to keep his cool as he adjusts to fatherhood Justin and Hayley Bieber's pregnancy announcement [Justin Bieber](/latest/justin-bieber) has officially become a dad, causing some to question if [he is prepared for such responsibility.](/entertainment/celebrity-news/147273/justin-bieber-outburst-fans-struggles-fatherhood) The 30-year-old singer and his wife, [Hailey Bieber,](/latest/hailey-bieber) have recently [celebrated the birth of their son, Jack Blues Bieber.](/entertainment/celebrity-news/146778/hailey-bieber-gives-birth-first-child-husband-justin-unique-name) Justin announced the joyous news with an [eft fans confused after deleting the post](/entertainment/celebrity-news/146785/justin-bieber-baby-social-media-hack). Under the photo, the caption read: "WELCOME HOME JACK BLUES BIEBER," accompanied by a bear emoji. [Justin Bieber tried making 'peace’ with Selena Gomez and Benny Blanco despite his views](/entertainment/celebrity-news/146733/Justin-Bieber-peace-Selena-Gomez-Benny-Blanco) [Desperate Justin Bieber 'miserable' as wife Hailey spends his millions, insiders claim](/entertainment/celebrity-news/145026/justin-bieber-labeled-as-miserable) An incident casting doubt on Justin's readiness occurred shortly before Hailey gave birth. He was caught on video shortly after his arrival at The Peninsula Hotel in Los Angeles in his Tesla Cybertruck. The clip appeared to show Justin angrily confronting and [raging at a group of teens](/entertainment/celebrity-news/145567/justin-bieber-angry-video-group-of-teenagers)—the footage quickly went viral. In her first update since giving birth, the Rhode owner offered a peek into her new life with baby Jack Blues, sharing the experience with her followers. However, not everyone is confident about Justin's current state. An inside source revealed to InTouch Weekly their concerns over his behavior, noting his tendency to lose composure over minor irritations. They shared: "Justin does not seem to be in a great place. He's been snapping a lot in public and freaking out over meaningless stuff." DON'T MISS... [Justin Bieber flips off camera in raw 'adorable' pics with pregnant wife Hailey](/entertainment/celebrity-news/144449/justin-bieber-wife-hailey-baby-bump-pictures) [NEWS] [Pregnant Hailey Bieber wows in nude lace catsuit on date night with Justin ](/entertainment/celebrity-news/141231/Pregnant-Hailey-Bieber-nude-lace-date-Justin)[PICTURES] [Selena Gomez planned to adopt a child alone before Benny Blanco romance](/entertainment/celebrity-news/139010/selena-gomez-child-adoption-alone-benny-blanco) [INSIGHT []](/entertainment/celebrity-news/139010/selena-gomez-child-adoption-alone-benny-blanco) The insider continued: "It's obvious that he's stressed and not coping very well with his emotions, and a lot of people in his life would love to see him get some coaching on how to better manage his anger." "Everywhere he goes, people are either clamoring for a piece of him or purposely trying to get him to react, so it's understandable he'd get triggered. But that's the sort of stress he will always face as someone with his level of fame," the source added. With his increased fame comes heightened attention from paparazzi and negative social media commentary. His struggles with fame and mental health were laid bare in his YouTube documentary, Justin Bieber: Seasons.
